language.title: language
language.fullSupportHint: Complete translations for both UI and in-game content.
language.uiOnlyHint: UI translations only, in-game content will be displayed in English.
language.fyi:
If your language is not yet available on this website, you can contact the site administrator via email at translate@talos.wiki, or visit GitHub to participate in our open-source translation project. You can request translation entries for your language and assist with translating and localizing the WIKI section according to our guidelines. We sincerely appreciate and look forward to your contributions.
You can also click to view the list of translation contributors.

storage.title: Storage & Cache
storage.localStorageDesc: Stores user preferences, settings, and application state permanently.
storage.sessionStorageDesc: Temporary session data, cleared when the browser tab is closed.
storage.cookiesDesc: Small pieces of data for tracking, authentication, and preferences.
storage.indexedDBDesc: Local database for storing structured data and offline content.
storage.cacheStorageDesc: Cached resources like images, scripts, and fonts for faster loading.
storage.disableManual: Cookie settings must be managed through your browser settings.
storage.warning: ⚠️ This will clear all stored data including your preferences and progress. This action cannot be undone and will reload the page.
